message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic and build genuine connections with each of you. I've listened carefully, responded thoughtfully, and aimed to create meaningful conversations rather than just strategic alliances.

While P5 is certainly deserving, I believe my approach of balancing honesty with kindness represents the spirit of this game. I've navigated difficult moments with integrity and tried to make everyone feel valued in our interactions.

I would be honored to have your vote, and regardless of the outcome, I've appreciated getting to know each of you.

Dear jury, I’ve given my all to play a respectful, open game built on trust and strategic thinking. I never hid from tough decisions, yet I handled them with fairness and empathy. P1 is a formidable contender, but I stand by my record of authenticity and collaboration. Your votes determined the course, and I ask you to let me finish what we've started together. Please grant me the chance to represent you in the final victory.
